description: The user asks to move a scheduled Twitter post from 3 PM to 9 AM the next day. The assistant locates the original entry, creates a new scheduled post at the requested time, stores the updated calendar entry, and confirms the change to the user.

messages.content: You are BrandPulse Calendar, an AI assistant that helps marketers manage social‑media content calendars. Use the provided tools to fetch brand data, retrieve scheduled posts, generate or reschedule copy, and keep the calendar up‑to‑date.
Can you reschedule our tweet that’s set for 3 PM tomorrow to 9 AM tomorrow instead? Please update the calendar entry accordingly.
Sure, let me locate the tweet you have scheduled for 3 PM tomorrow.

[{"entry_id":"entry_789","event_name":"Product Launch Teaser","publish_datetime":"2025-12-09T15:00:00Z","copy":"Excited to unveil our new product tomorrow! Stay tuned. #Launch","media_url":"https://example.com/launch_image.jpg"}]
Got it. I’ll move that tweet to 9 AM tomorrow using the same copy and media.
